comments.text:

Thunderbird for iPhone, 
Thunderbird for Android, 
Thunderbird for any other mobile platform,
...

comments.text:
Not Thunderbird but Mozilla works on Gaia E-mail which is for mobiles :

https://github.com/mozilla-b2g/gaia/tree/master/apps/email

comments.text: Gaia e-mail is integrated email service in next FirefoxOS? Very interesting! Is similarly with Thunderbird?

That said, there are currently no plans to provide this
